ygData.subject: New to Online Gaming
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to all that replied to my original message.  Bought the trilogy, started this afternoon,  9 hours later I can see why its called Evercrack.  Started  a
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks to all that replied to my original message. Bought the
trilogy, started this afternoon, 9 hours later I can see why its
called Evercrack. Started a wood elf ranger.
2 questions:
1. In the game on the main screen on the middle right is a green bar
with a number , a percentage, another percentage, and a second number
(always changing), what is it? I couldn't find in the manual.

2. Can anyone recommend a site/guide that has a good EQ lingo
glossary.

Thanks again

2. Also
